fullplot: Korean Min-june is getting over her recent break-up and while pondering over that she bumps her car into a man who as her luck might have it is her new boss. Unknowingly she pretends to not speak English thinking that this would be the last she would see of him. Robin Heiden(Daniel Henney) has come to Korea to take over a company and she is convinced that he hates her. Between the obvious sparks we see a bet emerge, where Min-june is dared to seduce him and make him apologize for his behavior. Will she succeed in seducing him? or will she once again get her heart broken??

title: Mr. Robin kkosigi
